All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Animation
Animation holds a value which increments from 0 to 1 over some duration.
Animation.RepeatMode
 
Animation.State
 
AnimationCurve
Animation curves transforms an animation's value from a (0 - 1) range to a point on a curve
AnimationCurves
Deprecated.
Use static constants from AnimationCurve instead
Application
Application is the heart of a GameKit program.
Camera
Singleton class which controls which part of the game world is rendered in the Window
Input
Singleton class responsible for capturing keyboard and mouse inputs for use in the application.
IO
Static class responsible for resource loading and file output.
MathUtils
Utility class providing commonly used math utility methods
Prop
Represents game objects within Scenes.
Renderer
Static class containing all supported draw calls of the engine.
Scene
A representation of a logical part of your application.
Task
Interface for an arbitrary task
Timeout
Timeout executes a specified Task after its duration has elapsed.
Window
Singleton class which manages the JFrame the application is rendered in.
